name: Aakash S
my_business:
VISION:
To revolutionize the built environment through innovative, sustainable, and human-centric design, creating spaces that inspire, function seamlessly, and positively impact communities worldwide.
top_product: We have had the opportunity to design both gated villa and apartment communities for one of Chennai’s leading developers. Our portfolio also includes a wide range of commercial complexes and convention centers across Chennai and its surroundings. In addition to residential and commercial projects, we have delivered luxury villa designs in cities like Vellore, Tirunelveli, Bangalore, and several others. Our contribution to public spaces includes designing thematic parks such as Sponge Park, Pink Park (exclusively for women), Turf Park for adults, and Rainwater Harvesting Parks — all developed for regions under the Greater Chennai Corporation.
ideal_referral: Project management consultants Architects Interior designers Developers Promoters Builders Franchise outlets Corporates
top_problem_solved: One of our clients, a developer, approached us with a challenging project — a highly congested site with minimal frontage, making conventional apartment design nearly impossible. Despite the constraints, we crafted a thoughtful design solution featuring well-ventilated flats, extended balconies, and internal courtyards, creating a unique and livable experience. At the outset, the client had little expectation of immediate sales and was prepared to market the units only towards the end of construction. However, our innovative design approach, coupled with the best possible amenities for the site, turned the project into a standout success. The entire development was sold out even before the official launch. The client was thrilled with the outcome, and today, he is one of Chennai's prominent developers. He has been a loyal, recurring client for the past five years — a testament to the value of thoughtful design, even in the most constrained scenarios.
my_favourite_bni_story: BNI has been incredibly valuable in helping us collaborate across regions. I had a client in Mumbai who needed a local contractor, and thanks to BNI Connect, I was able to seamlessly connect with a trusted BNI member in that area. The trust and credibility that comes with the BNI network made it easy to hand over the project with confidence — and as a result, I was able to retain my client without any compromise. Truly grateful to BNI for making such smooth collaborations possible!

name: Mohana Krishnan
top_product: • Clash-Free MEP Coordination: Detect and resolve conflicts early with precise BIM modeling. • Optimized HVAC, Plumbing & Electrical Design: Efficient, sustainable system layouts tailored for performance. • Accurate 3D MEP Modeling: Detailed models that drive better construction planning and execution. • Seamless Collaboration: Integrate all disciplines for on-time and within-budget project delivery. • Facility Management Ready Models: As-built MEP BIM models for easier maintenance and lifecycle management.
ideal_referral: • Architects • Civil Engineers • MEP Consultants • Structural Engineers • General Contractors • Real Estate Developers • Project Managers • Facility Managers • Government Tender Consultants • Infrastructure Developers
top_problem_solved: How We Solve MEP Design Challenges Many construction projects face delays and cost overruns because of MEP design clashes and poor coordination. At Bim Bytes Solutions, we use advanced BIM tools to detect these issues early before construction begins. For example, on a recent residential project, our MEP design helped identify conflicts between plumbing and electrical systems that could have caused costly rework. By resolving these problems in the design phase, we saved the client time and money. Our precise and coordinated MEP designs ensure smooth construction, reduce errors, and deliver efficient, reliable building systems every time.
my_favourite_bni_story: Our MEP Story for Residential Projects At Bim Bytes Solutions, we design smart and efficient MEP systems for homes. Using BIM technology, we make sure heating, cooling, plumbing, and electrical systems work perfectly together without problems. This helps builders save time and avoid mistakes. Our goal is to create comfortable, safe, and energy-efficient homes that people love to live in. We make sure every detail is planned well, so the home works smoothly from day one.

name: P. Dhanraj
top_product: DRS Ultra - Universal Batching Plant Automation SCADA Software.
ideal_referral: RMC Batching Plant Owners, Batching Plant Manufacturers and Industrial Automation Projects.
top_problem_solved: Had provided user friendly SCADA application ( DRS Ultra ) to Many RMC Plant owners to control and effectively produce Ready Mix Concrete with maximum efficiency and high reliability without breakdown. One of our client "DATCHAYANI RMC" in Chennai were facing serious production issues in delivering the concrete ON-Time to Chennai Metro Rail Limited. They were facing inaccuracy and slow concrete production in their SANY 60 Cbm Batching Plant and we have successfully changed their system with DRS Ultra which helped then achieve the maximum output of 57 m3 with optimum accuracy, which in turn made CMRL to complete the project faster and made the city's INFRA better.
my_favourite_bni_story: Once upon a time there lived a greedy king and he wants to posses all the possible wealth with him. With his greed and cunningness he could able to posses wealth beyond his imagination and he is happy for a week and months later the enthusiasm about his possessing got faded away and to his surprise he is depressed about his life of not having joy even after possessing all. One fine day he met his life's end and eventually died by leaving his possessions to the world. To Note : Getting everything we desire is a curse and moving one step towards our desire is a blessing. People who realize this will set their desire too high and move towards it and live happily till end. Embrace Failures and Success equally. Failures create good memories and Success gives confidence. "Happiness and Positive attitude is a state of Mind and it has nothing to do with results" It is always a giver who gains.

my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite BNI moments was when I received my first men's grooming consultation referral through a fellow member. Since then, I’ve connected with amazing entrepreneurs, learned how to present my services better, and even found reliable vendors for my studio setup—curtains, insurance, interiors all through BNI connects. It showed me that BNI isn’t just about business, it’s about growing with the right network.

top_problem_solved: “Our team needs laptops immediately.” VJ Computers provides quick delivery laptop rentals — any quantity, any configuration. “Our office systems are slow and keeps hanging.” We do system service, upgrades, SSD installation, RAM upgrade to boost speed instantly. “We don’t have proper IT support.” Our AMC (Annual Maintenance Contract) gives complete IT care — no downtime. “We need CCTV for security but don’t know the right setup.” We install HD/IP CCTV with the right coverage, remote viewing, and professional wiring. “Power cuts are affecting our work.” We provide UPS sales, service & battery replacement for uninterrupted power. “Budget is low… but we need new systems.” Affordable refurbished laptops, rentals and flexible packages. “We need temporary laptops for a project/event.” Short-term laptop/desktop rentals for trainings, workshops, and events. “We need fast service support — not delays.” 24/7 support with quick replacement and on- “We don’t know what IT setup our office needs.” We provide free consultation + complete office IT planning. “Our existing vendor is not reliable.” VJ Computers ensures reliable pricing, timely support, and trustworthy service.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story is about the day I realised the true power of this network. I had just joined BNI, and one member trusted me with a small laptop rental requirement. I delivered on time, gave my best service, and didn’t expect much. But what happened next surprised me — that one small order turned into multiple referrals, those referrals turned into bigger orders, and within a few months, my business visibility and confidence completely changed. That moment made me understand something clearly: “In BNI, every small opportunity becomes a big possibility when you serve with heart.” Today, many of my best customers came from the trust of BNI members. That is why this is my favourite BNI story — a simple referral that created a strong relationship, and a strong relationship that built my business.
